|brand = Roku |model = 2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = XS, XD, HD (3100X) Wireless Module |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = SDIO |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = SD (solder down) |formfactor = module
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TC23100X |icid = 5959A-3100X |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0D:4B
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4336; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/29/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This FCC ID [https://fccid.io/TC23100X TC23100X] covers the models: *[[Roku 2 HD (3000X)]] *[[Roku 2 XD (3050X)]] *[[Roku 2 XS (3100X)]]
The [[Roku LT (2400X)]] (FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TC22400X TC22400X]) also uses BCM4336 (OUI CC:6D:A0).
*The full part number of the ''[[Broadcom]]'' chip is BCM4336YKFFBG. :[[Broadcom]] BCM4336 SDIO (1x1:1 SISO) [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcmfmac] :[[Broadcom]] BCM20702 Bluetooth 4.0 chip
{{See also|Roku}}
